title: Prevalence of undernourishment worldwide 2000 to 2018
summary: In general Proportion of undernourished people has fallen over the Year.
Proportion of undernourished people is slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2014.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2005 and 2010.
Maximum Proportion of undernourished people, about 13.8 was reported at Year 2005
Minimum Proportion of undernourished people about 10.7 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: Overall Proportion of undernourished people has decreased over the Year.
Proportion of undernourished people is slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2014.
